overview: Enter the world of ultimate male sexual exploration…the HOLE world. The world of men who take it to the edge, then a little further, then a lot further, and never look back. Men like Bud, whose skin is a canvas for the art of tattoo, and whose ever-stretching asshole is a canvas for the expression of man’s potential for excruciating pleasure; men like Liam Reed, with a cock as thick as a man’s wrist and a wrist as thick as a baseball bat…both of which reach safe harbor in men’s buttholes, and bring them to howling sexual peaks.
title: Hole
